New_Brunswick.Al-Minhaal Academy:
Al-Minhaal Academy is an Islamic school located in South Plainfield, New Jersey serving students in pre-kindergarten through twelfth grade. Al-Minhaal Academy also has a full-time masjid.
As of the 2013-14 school year, the school had an enrollment of 285 students (plus 34 in PreK) and 41.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 7.0:1.
